movies.classes.dateOfMovies

Class DateOfMovies

  • java.lang.Object
    • movies.classes.dateOfMovies.DateOfMovies

  • public class DateOfMovies
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to the date attribute of movies

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DateOfMovies()
      This constructor is to set today's date if non parameter is given Time Zone used is GMT-5
      DateOfMovies(int day, int month, int year)
      This constructor is to set movie's date if day,month and year are given

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDay()
      Get Day of Movie´s Date
      int getMonth()
      Get Month of Movie´s Date
      int getYear()
      Get Year of Movie´s Date
      void setDay(int day)
      this method is to set day of movie's date if day is less than zero or greater than 31 it will be set as the default day which is the current day
      void setMonth(int month)
      this method is to set month of movie's date if given parameter is less than zero or higher than 13 the month will be set as today's month
      void setYear(int year)
      this method is to set year of movie's date if the year is less than 1999 the year will be set as today´s year
      java.lang.String toString()
      Get a String that represents Movie´s Date which follows next format: Day/Month/Year

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
